data.message: Add rm -rf auto-detection to duro_can_execute: Added destructive_args_keywords tuple to ActionRisk.from_action() in autonomy_ladder.py. Now auto-detects rm -rf, rm -r, rmdir, del /s, rd /s, drop, truncate, delete from, git push -f, git reset --hard, --force flags without needing is_destructive=true override.
data.outcome: Added destructive_args_keywords tuple to ActionRisk.from_action() in autonomy_ladder.py. Now auto-detects rm -rf, rm -r, rmdir, del /s, rd /s, drop, truncate, delete from, git push -f, git reset --hard, --force flags without needing is_destructive=true override.
